OOC: Huh.. we'll find one with time....
Thunderstorm: Are we there yet?

It

> I'm 
> > > > sure

> of 
> > > > > fighting. In fact I jumped in the...hey....I'm not dumb

> > > need 
> > > > > new legs. Let's go.
